name: Dungeons & Treasures
description:
Crawl the Dungeon for the Treasure hidden within~

Dungeons & Treasures is a short single player maze puzzle game with no instruction with intention to create a game for even newcomers can enjoy. Explore the dungeon and solve puzzles to open the way to your ultimate GOLD.

Full game is available for play on both Browser and Windows. However, there are still some shortcomings that I will implement soon.

  • Sound effects: Although the game can be completed, certain interactions will not have sound effects. 
  • Settings: As not all sounds are ready yet, volume adjustments are temporarily unavailable. Sorry.
  • Save System: The game does not save, even in downloaded version.

Best played when downloaded. Browser version can still be played but will have problems with lights but nothing game breaking.

I hope you enjoy the game!
